mapper.sql: select collection_id as collectionId, images as images, create_time as createTime, user as user, ip, description as description, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime from monitor_images_collection
mapper.select:
WHERE 1=1
and user=#{user}
and (images like concat("%",#{key},"%") or description like concat("%",#{key},"%") or ip like concat("%",#{key},"%") )
ORDER by collection_id DESC
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_images_collection( images, create_time, user, description, ip, last_modify_time ) values( #{images}, #{createTime}, #{user}, #{description}, #{ip}, #{lastModifyTime} )
mapper.update: update monitor_images_collection set images=#{images}, create_time=#{createTime}, user=#{user}, ip=#{ip}, description=#{description}, last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime} where collection_id=#{collectionId}
mapper.delete: DELETE from monitor_images_collection where collection_id=#{collectionId} and user=#{user}
